definitions.text: something that serves to indicate or suggest
examples: symptoms are the prime indicants of disease

definitions.text: the act of indicating or pointing out by name
(medicine) a reason to prescribe a drug or perform a procedure
examples: the presence of bacterial infection was an indication for the use of antibiotics

definitions.text: something (as a course of action) that is indicated as expedient or necessary
examples: there were indications that it was time to leave

definitions.text: a datum about some physical state that is presented to a user by a meter or similar instrument
examples: he could not believe the meter reading
the barometer gave clear indications of an approaching storm
